title: Ranked Decay in 3v3
body: Does anyone know how ranked decay works for 3v3? As it's only up once a week, climbing above plat seems like it's near impossible. I know there's not many that play it but I also know there's a few people that play it non stop everytime it's available so some answers would be really appreciated.

replies.body:
TT ranked decay works as it does in SR, kicking in at least 28 days since your last played game of Ranked TT (for Platinum/Diamond players). So as long as you get one game in every 4 weeks then you should not decay.

There are much stricter decay rules for Master/Challenger players and that is something we're aware might not be viable with such a limited time queue, so we're going to assess what options we have to make this more appropriate for TT in Oceania.

Wow thank you for such a quick and informative response, I was unaware Plat-Dia decay only kicked in after 28 days so that's good news to hear, as for the challenger/master tier I understand that's a tricky situation but I appreciate you guys allowing ranked TT in the first place, as I thought we'd never get it. Again - thank you for the information. :)
